text: Malek Saleem Abdullah (born 13 May 1985) is a Qatari professional basketball player. He currently plays for Al Wakrah of the Qatari Basketball League. He represented Qatar's national basketball team at the 2016 FIBA Asia Challenge in Tehran, Iran. There, he was his team's best free throw shooter.Qatar - FIBA Asia Challenge 2016, FIBA.com, accessed 2 April 2017. ==References== ==External links== * Asia-basket.com Profile * 2016 FIBA Asia Challenge Profile * FIBA Archive Profile Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:People from Doha Category:Qatari men's basketball players Category:Asian Games medalists in basketball Category:Basketball players at the 2006 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Qatar Category:Medalists at the 2006 Asian Games Category:2006 FIBA World Championship players
title: Malek Saleem
